title: 8 Premium Gaming Laptops With Nvidia Graphics And Backlit Keyboard
text: If you are looking for the best gaming laptops in India that come with top-tier specifications such as Nvidia graphics cards as well as a stunning backlit keyboard, then you are in luck. With 16GB or more RAM, Intel and AMD processors, and several more features, check out top models from the best laptop brands such as Asus, Dell, Lenovo, and Acer. There are a lot of specifications that go into building the best gaming laptops in India. That is because gaming is a very hardware-intensive activity, and uses a lot of CPU, GPU, and RAM input. Take any game you can imagine, for instance, Red Dead Redemption 2 or Forza Horizon 5, and you’ll find that systems with low-end specifications can run them on low to medium settings. At the same time, systems with high-end specifications, such as Nvidia Graphics cards (3070, 4060, 4090, and the like) and high-end processors (Intel Core i7, i9, AMD Ryzen 7) are capable of running the games at maximum quality. This is why it is important to opt for some of the best gaming laptops in India, which come from the best laptop brands such as HP, Lenovo, Asus, and Acer.  Unlock a new dimension of gaming with these premium laptops. Apart from holding high-quality specifications, they also come with top-notch aesthetics and stunning backlit keyboards that give a unique look. Go beyond the standard of PC gaming with these best laptops in India that are unprecedentedly impeccable and come with the ability to shoot past the threshold of mid-carder gaming laptop specifications.  Read More: 8 Best Gaming Laptops With 16GB RAM and i7 Processor   Here are our recommendations for you to skyrocket your way to the zenith of PC gaming. With protective features for eye comfort, accessibility, and ergonomic designs, these are some of the best gaming laptops in India that will keep you up to date with upcoming games like GTA 6, Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League, and more.    Here is an HP laptop that features powerful specifications. This laptop offers a 12th-generation Intel Core i5 processor with a configuration of 8 cores and 12 threads, along with a cache of 12MB L3. This processor is capable of sustaining itself without any overheating issues, which is something that predominantly bothers gamers. Moreover, get access to popular games such as League of Legends, Fortnite, Valorant, Call of Duty: Warzone, and more.   Coming to display, the laptop has a screen size of 15.6 inches, which allows for true immersion. This is combined with a full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080, an anti-glare display, a refresh rate of 144Hz, and more. Get an elegant backlit keyboard with this premium laptop for gaming. HP Laptop Price: Rs 68,990. This laptop also features the fast charging ability to bring it to 50% battery in a matter of just 30 minutes. This is due to the 6-cell, 83W battery that is capable of allowing you a total of 6 hours and 30-minute gaming sessions without any interruptions. Collaborate and create content with others through the True Vision 1080p full HD camera that features a privacy shutter. HP Laptop Price: Rs 94,990. Powered by the Intel Core i5 processor 12500H, you get a maximum speed of up to 4.50 GHz. This speed is achievable due to its 12-core, 16-thread configuration with a cache of 18 MB.   Furthermore, you get to use the 16GB RAM memory of the DDR5 iteration that comes with a memory clock speed of 4800 MHz. For keeping many games installed and ready to be played at a moment’s notice, this laptop comes with a storage of 1TB SSD that is as fast as the processing power. For cooling, the Alienware inspired thermal vents offer optimal cool due to the dual air-intake and copper pipes. Lastly, this laptop has an orange backlit keyboard for keeping your experience engaging and accessible. Dell Laptop Price: Rs 72,990. While the ASUS ROG and the ZEPHYRUS series feature powerful laptops, this TUF system also has some top-notch features to offer. With one month free subscription for the Xbox Game Pass, you can play several top games such as Age of Empires IV, Forza Horizon 5, Need for Speed Heat, Titanfall 2, and Halo Infinite for no cost.   Moreover, you also get to work with the powerful Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 graphics card that comes with a VRAM of 4GB. Get memory clock speed of up to 1585MHz with the VRAM at 60W, which propels itself further when being used with the inbuilt Dynamic Boost feature. There’s also the swift refresh rate of 144Hz, which ensures that you get a speed of 144 frames per seconds no matter how complex the on-screen graphical rendering is. ASUS Laptop Price: Rs 68,990. With it, you get a VRAM of 6GB and GDDR6 memory type. You won’t encounter any visual or performative stutter at any given moment with this laptop. Acer Laptop Price: Rs 77,990. Coming with immersive 3D surround sound along with exciting features such as sound tracker, N-force and sound sharing, this Lenovo laptop is great for a movie-watching experience. If you want to get an exemplary gaming experience, the keyboard in this laptop has some of the best features such as large arrow keys, 1.3mm travel distance, 100% anti-ghosting and soft landing switches.   On another note, you get to work with a 512GB SSD for storage which has PCIe 4.0 for fast access. Along with an AMD processor, you get proprietary settings such as the Thread Director 2 for accommodating various workloads at once. If you are worried about your eye-safety, then know that this laptop comes with an anti-glare screen for longevity. Lenovo Laptop Price: Rs 62,990. The 4050 does have better power efficiency and DLSS3 support, but the RTX 3060 is part of some of the best gaming laptops in India due to its raw speed.
